text:
On page:
http://tomcat.apache.org/connectors-doc/webserver_howto/apache.html

1) "mod_jk.nlm or or MOD_JK.SRVPGM" should be changed to "mod_jk.nlm or MOD_JK.SRVPGM".
   Note, "or" is repeated twice, currently.

2) "reasons is is strongly" should be changed to "reasons it is strongly".
  Here, "is" is repeated twice.
creator: sajad_bashir@rediffmail.com

text:
Thanks for the information. Fixed in r1339522. Will be part of version 1.2.37.
